verses.name: Judges 3:1
verses.text: Now these are the nations which the Lord left, to prove Israel by them, even as many of Israel as had not known all the wars of Canaan;

verses.name: Judges 3:2
verses.text: Only that the generations of the children of Israel might know, to teach them war, at the least such as before knew nothing thereof;

verses.name: Judges 3:3
verses.text: Namely, five lords of the Philistines, and all the Canaanites, and the Sidonians, and the Hivites that dwelt in mount Lebanon, from mount Baal–hermon unto the entering in of Hamath.
